When I use my variable created in JSON Extractor I cannot use it in Random Variable as Maximum Value. The variables value is not getting evaluated inside Maximum Value field when used.

I have a variable totalIncentives which is created in JSON Extractor

Then I want it use as Maximum Value in Random Variable

Unfortunately i always get 0 as random value.
creator: amar.darisa@gmail.com
felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Your observation is correct. The input is evaluated on test plan start time. Therefore your extracted values are not available and will be evaluated as "0".

The random value config is called on each iteration (start of each iteration), but it will not re-evaluate the input at those times. Even if it would, the first iteration would always be "0".

I am not sure, if this is a bug or works as designed. But this behaviour should probably be mentioned in the documentation.
